DOC.brief_summary: The PRESERVE-Zenith® Iliac Branch System Clinical Study is a clinical trial to study the safety and effectiveness of the Zenith® Branch Endovascular Graft-Iliac Bifurcation in combination with the Zenith® Connection Endovascular Stent/ConnectSX™ covered stent in the treatment of aorto-iliac and iliac aneurysms.
DOC.brief_title: PRESERVE-Zenith® Iliac Branch System Clinical Study
DOC.criteria: An aortoiliac or iliac aneurysm of appropriate size Unsuitable distal sealing site for a traditional Zenith® iliac leg graft within the common iliac artery Less than 18 years of age Inability or refusal to give informed consent Disease considerations that would compromise patient safety or study outcomes Unsuitable arterial anatomy
